short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add diaereses and ligatures to English text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds diaereses and ligatures to English text.

Examples:
- "coöperate" and "coöperate" both become "coöperate".
- "demon" and "daemon" both become "dæmon".

Inhabit an alternate universe where the conventions of English writing style developed differently!
